name: EufyLife
0:
”Alexa, change the kitchen to the color blue.”
”Alexa, make the living room lights warmer.”
”Alexa, set the dining room lights cooler.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The eufy Life Skill allows you to control your Lights by using Amazon Alexa. To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button above to link your eufy account and to discover your eufy Life product.
If this skill does not respond as expected, please make sure:
1）Light is online.
2）You have connected Light with the eufy Life app.
3）Your Alexa speaker is online.

Compatible products:
-eufy Permanent Outdoor Lights E22
-eufy Outdoor String Lights E10
-eufy Outdoor Spotlights E10
-eufy Outdoor Pathway Lights E10
-eufy Indoor Floor Lamp E10

The eufy Life skill for Amazon Alexa helps you make the lights in your home more brilliant. After connecting Alexa to your Light, just say: "Alexa, change the Light to the color blue."
 "Alexa, make the Light warmer."
 "Alexa, set the Light cooler."
 "Alexa, set the Light softer."
 "Alexa, make the Light warm white."

If two or more Light devices are added to the eufy Life app and you use Alexa to control them, use the eufy Life app to rename each Light. Names should be easy to pronounce in English and must not contain an emoji or special characters. When giving a command, replace (light name) with the name of your Lights. "Alexa, change the Light(light name) to the color blue."
 "Alexa, make the Light(light name) warmer."
 "Alexa, set the Light(light name) cooler."
 "Alexa, set the Light(light name) softer."
 "Alexa, make the Light(light name) warm white."
If you have any questions on Light, please contact eufy Suppport: 
1-800-988-7973 (US) 
Mon-Fri 6:00AM - 5:00PM (PT)
Sat 7:00AM - 3:30PM (PT)
